title: JSC Avdiivka Directio Rusian of the Army Shelled Alexandropil, Ceramics, Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Ukrainian Donetsk Region. ...
content: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Oleksandropil, Keramik, Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Ukrayinsk of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Tsukuryne of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
